verses.verse: הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> The word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> which came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> from the LORD וּנְבוּכַדְרֶאצַּ֣ר <WH5019> when Nebuchadnezzar מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king בָּבֶ֣ל ׀ <WH894> of Babylon וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all חֵיל֡וֹ <WH2428> and all his army וְכָל־ <WH3605> all מַמְלְכ֣וֹת <WH4467> and all the kingdoms אֶרֶץ֩ <WH776> of the earth מֶמְשֶׁ֨לֶת <WH4475> his dominion יָד֜וֹ <WH3027> able וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעַמִּ֗ים <WH5971> and all the people נִלְחָמִ֧ים <WH3898> fought עַל־ <WH5921> against יְרוּשָׁלִַ֛ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וְעַל־ <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֶ֖יהָ <WH5892> and against all the cities לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> thereof saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel הָלֹךְ֙ <WH1980> Go וְאָ֣מַרְתָּ֔ <WH559> and speak אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> to Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah וְאָמַרְתָּ֣ <WH559> and tell אֵלָ֗יו <WH413> to him כֹּ֚ה <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> him Thus saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> behold נֹתֵ֜ן <WH5414> Behold I will give אֶת־ <WH853> הָעִ֤יר <WH5892> this city הַזֹּאת֙ <WH2063> into בְּיַ֣ד <WH3027> into the hand מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֔ל <WH894> of Babylon וּשְׂרָפָ֖הּ <WH8313> and he shall burn בָּאֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> it with fire

וְאַתָּ֗ה <WH859> you לֹ֚א <WH3808> You will not תִמָּלֵט֙ <WH4422> And thou shalt not escape out מִיָּד֔וֹ <WH3027> of his hand כִּ֚י <WH3588> for תָּפֹ֣שׂ <WH8610> but shalt surely תִּתָּפֵ֔שׂ <WH8610> be taken וּבְיָד֖וֹ <WH3027> into his hand תִּנָּתֵ֑ן <WH5414> and delivered וְֽ֠עֵינֶיךָ <WH5869> and thine eyes אֶת־ <WH853> עֵינֵ֨י <WH5869> the eyes מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king בָּבֶ֜ל <WH894> of Babylon תִּרְאֶ֗ינָה <WH7200> shall behold וּפִ֛יהוּ <WH6310> with thee mouth אֶת־ <WH854> for פִּ֥יךָ <WH6310> to mouth יְדַבֵּ֖ר <WH1696> and he shall speak וּבָבֶ֥ל <WH894> to Babylon תָּבֽוֹא׃ <WH935> and thou shalt go

אַ֚ךְ <WH389> Yet שְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> Yet hear דְּבַר־ <WH1697> the word יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> O Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֤ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD עָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> concerning לֹ֥א <WH3808> You will not תָמ֖וּת <WH4191> of thee Thou shalt not die בֶּחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> by the sword

בְּשָׁל֣וֹם <WH7965> in peace תָּמ֗וּת <WH4191> [But] thou shalt die וּֽכְמִשְׂרְפ֣וֹת <WH4955> and with the burnings אֲ֠בוֹתֶיךָ <WH1> of thy fathers הַמְּלָכִ֨ים <WH4428> kings הָרִֽאשֹׁנִ֜ים <WH7223> the former אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who הָי֣וּ <WH1961> become לְפָנֶ֗יךָ <WH6440> which were before כֵּ֚ן <WH3651> so יִשְׂרְפוּ־ <WH8313> thee so shall they burn לָ֔ךְ וְה֥וֹי <WH1945> thee [saying] Ah אָד֖וֹן <WH113> lord יִסְפְּדוּ־ <WH5594> [odours] for thee and they will lament לָ֑ךְ כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for דָבָ֥ר <WH1697> the word אֲנִֽי־ <WH589> I דִבַּ֖רְתִּי <WH1696> for I have pronounced נְאֻם־ <WH5002> saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD ס

וַיְדַבֵּר֙ <WH1696> spake יִרְמְיָ֣הוּ <WH3414> Then Jeremiah הַנָּבִ֔יא <WH5030> the prophet אֶל־ <WH413> to צִדְקִיָּ֖הוּ <WH6667> unto Zedekiah מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah אֵ֛ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַדְּבָרִ֥ים <WH1697> all these words הָאֵ֖לֶּה <WH428> these בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> in Jerusalem

וְחֵ֣יל <WH2428> army מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> When the king בָּבֶ֗ל <WH894> of Babylon's נִלְחָמִים֙ <WH3898> fought עַל־ <WH5921> against יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> against Jerusalem וְעַ֛ל <WH5921> and against כָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> and against all the cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah הַנּֽוֹתָר֑וֹת <WH3498> that were left אֶל־ <WH413> to לָכִישׁ֙ <WH3923> against Lachish וְאֶל־ <WH413> and עֲזֵקָ֔ה <WH5825> and against Azekah כִּ֣י <WH3588> for הֵ֗נָּה <WH2007> in נִשְׁאֲר֛וּ <WH7604> remained בְּעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> cities יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah עָרֵ֥י <WH5892> of the cities מִבְצָֽר׃ <WH4013> for these defenced פ

הַדָּבָ֛ר <WH1697> [This is] the word אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הָיָ֥ה <WH1961> came אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֖הוּ <WH3414> that came unto Jeremiah מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> יְהוָ֑ה <WH3069> God אַחֲרֵ֡י <WH310> after כְּרֹת֩ <WH3772> had made הַמֶּ֨לֶךְ <WH4428> that the king צִדְקִיָּ֜הוּ <WH6667> Zedekiah בְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> a covenant אֶת־ <WH854> with כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָם֙ <WH5971> with all the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who בִּירֽוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> which [were] at Jerusalem לִקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> to proclaim לָהֶ֖ם <WH1992> like דְּרֽוֹר׃ <WH1865> liberty

לְ֠שַׁלַּח <WH7971> go אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> That every man אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדּ֞וֹ <WH5650> should let his manservant וְאִ֧ישׁ <WH376> and every man אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁפְחָת֛וֹ <WH8198> his maidservant הָעִבְרִ֥י <WH5680> [being] an Hebrew וְהָעִבְרִיָּ֖ה <WH5680> or an Hebrewess חָפְשִׁ֑ים <WH2670> free לְבִלְתִּ֧י <WH1115> no עֲבָד־ <WH5647> that none should serve בָּ֛ם בִּיהוּדִ֥י <WH3064> himself of them [to wit] of a Jew אָחִ֖יהוּ <WH251> his brother אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> and each

וַיִּשְׁמְעוּ֩ <WH8085> heard כָל־ <WH3605> and all הַשָּׂרִ֨ים <WH8269> Now when all the princes וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> and all the people אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֣אוּ <WH935> which had entered בַבְּרִ֗ית <WH1285> into the covenant לְ֠שַׁלַּח <WH7971> go אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> that every one אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדּ֞וֹ <WH5650> should let his manservant וְאִ֤ישׁ <WH376> and every one אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁפְחָתוֹ֙ <WH8198> his maidservant חָפְשִׁ֔ים <WH2670> free לְבִלְתִּ֥י <WH1115> no עֲבָד־ <WH5647> that none should serve בָּ֖ם ע֑וֹד <WH5750> any וַֽיִּשְׁמְע֖וּ <WH8085> themselves of them any more then they obeyed וַיְשַׁלֵּֽחוּ׃ <WH7971> and let [them] go

וַיָּשׁ֙וּבוּ֙ <WH7725> they turned אַחֲרֵי־ <WH310> But afterward כֵ֔ן <WH3651> after that וַיָּשִׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> to return אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעֲבָדִים֙ <WH5650> and caused the servants וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁפָח֔וֹת <WH8198> and the handmaids אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> whom שִׁלְּח֖וּ <WH7971> whom they had let go חָפְשִׁ֑ים <WH2670> free [וַיַּכְבִּישׁוּם כ] (וַֽיִּכְבְּשׁ֔וּם <WH3533> bring into bondage ק) לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> for servants וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8198> and for handmaids ס

וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> came דְבַר־ <WH1697> Therefore the word יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> of the LORD אֶֽל־ <WH413> to יִרְמְיָ֔הוּ <WH3414> came to Jeremiah מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> Thus אָמַ֥ר <WH559> Thus saith יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> the God יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> I כָּרַ֤תִּֽי <WH3772> I made בְרִית֙ <WH1285> a covenant אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲב֣וֹתֵיכֶ֔ם <WH1> with your fathers בְּי֨וֹם <WH3117> in the day הוֹצִאִ֤י <WH3318> that I brought them forth אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִבֵּ֥ית <WH1004> out of the house עֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> of bondmen לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

מִקֵּ֣ץ <WH7093> At the end שֶׁ֣בַע <WH7651> of seven שָׁנִ֡ים <WH8141> years תְּֽשַׁלְּח֡וּ <WH7971> let ye go אִישׁ֩ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> אָחִ֨יו <WH251> his brother הָעִבְרִ֜י <WH5680> an Hebrew אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who יִמָּכֵ֣ר <WH4376> which hath been sold לְךָ֗ וַעֲבָֽדְךָ֙ <WH5647> unto thee and when he hath served שֵׁ֣שׁ <WH8337> thee six שָׁנִ֔ים <WH8141> years וְשִׁלַּחְתּ֥וֹ <WH7971> thou shalt let him go חָפְשִׁ֖י <WH2670> free מֵֽעִמָּ֑ךְ <WH5973> with וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not שָׁמְע֤וּ <WH8085> hearkened אֲבֽוֹתֵיכֶם֙ <WH1> from thee but your fathers אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> or הִטּ֖וּ <WH5186> not unto me neither inclined אֶת־ <WH853> אָזְנָֽם׃ <WH241> their ear

וַתָּשֻׁ֨בוּ <WH7725> turned אַתֶּ֜ם <WH859> Although הַיּ֗וֹם <WH3117> And ye were now וַתַּעֲשׂ֤וּ <WH6213> and had done אֶת־ <WH853> הַיָּשָׁר֙ <WH3477> right בְּעֵינַ֔י <WH5869> in my sight לִקְרֹ֥א <WH7121> in proclaiming דְר֖וֹר <WH1865> liberty אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> to his neighbour וַתִּכְרְת֤וּ <WH3772> and ye had made בְרִית֙ <WH1285> a covenant לְפָנַ֔י <WH6440> before בַּבַּ֕יִת <WH1004> me in the house אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נִקְרָ֥א <WH7121> which is called שְׁמִ֖י <WH8034> by my name עָלָֽיו׃ <WH5921> and

וַתָּשֻׁ֙בוּ֙ <WH7725> But ye turned וַתְּחַלְּל֣וּ <WH2490> and polluted אֶת־ <WH853> שְׁמִ֔י <WH8034> my name וַתָּשִׁ֗בוּ <WH7725> to return אִ֤ישׁ <WH376> and caused every man אֶת־ <WH853> עַבְדּוֹ֙ <WH5650> his servant וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and every man אֶת־ <WH853> שִׁפְחָת֔וֹ <WH8198> his handmaid אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> whom שִׁלַּחְתֶּ֥ם <WH7971> whom ye had set חָפְשִׁ֖ים <WH2670> at liberty לְנַפְשָׁ֑ם <WH5315> at their pleasure וַתִּכְבְּשׁ֣וּ <WH3533> and brought them into subjection אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לִֽהְי֣וֹת <WH1961> become לָכֶ֔ם לַעֲבָדִ֖ים <WH5650> to be unto you for servants וְלִשְׁפָחֽוֹת׃ <WH8198> and for handmaids ס

לָכֵן֮ <WH3651> Therefore כֹּה־ <WH3541> thus אָמַ֣ר <WH559> Therefore thus saith יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> the LORD אַתֶּם֙ <WH859> you לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not שְׁמַעְתֶּ֣ם <WH8085> Ye have not hearkened אֵלַ֔י <WH413> about לִקְרֹ֣א <WH7121> unto me in proclaiming דְר֔וֹר <WH1865> liberty אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> every one לְאָחִ֖יו <WH251> to his brother וְאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and every man לְרֵעֵ֑הוּ <WH7453> to his neighbour הִנְנִ֣י <WH2005> behold קֹרֵא֩ <WH7121> behold I proclaim לָכֶ֨ם דְּר֜וֹר <WH1865> a liberty נְאֻם־ <WH5002> for you saith יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> the LORD אֶל־ <WH413> to הַחֶ֙רֶב֙ <WH2719> to the sword אֶל־ <WH413> to הַדֶּ֣בֶר <WH1698> to the pestilence וְאֶל־ <WH413> and to הָרָעָ֔ב <WH7458> and to the famine וְנָתַתִּ֤י <WH5414> and I will make אֶתְכֶם֙ <WH853> [לִזְוָעָה כ] (לְזַעֲוָ֔ה <WH2113> be removed ק) לְכֹ֖ל <WH3605> to all מַמְלְכ֥וֹת <WH4467> into all the kingdoms הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

וְנָתַתִּ֣י <WH5414> And I will give אֶת־ <WH853> הָאֲנָשִׁ֗ים <WH376> the men הָעֹֽבְרִים֙ <WH5674> that have transgressed אֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִתִ֔י <WH1285> my covenant אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> who לֹֽא־ <WH3808> have not הֵקִ֙ימוּ֙ <WH6965> which have not performed אֶת־ <WH853> דִּבְרֵ֣י <WH1697> the words הַבְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> of the covenant אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which כָּרְת֖וּ <WH3772> which they had made לְפָנָ֑י <WH6440> before הָעֵ֙גֶל֙ <WH5695> the calf אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> who כָּרְת֣וּ <WH3772> me when they cut לִשְׁנַ֔יִם <WH8147> in twain וַיַּעַבְר֖וּ <WH5674> and passed בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between בְּתָרָֽיו׃ <WH1335> between the parts
